project_descr: Country energy efficiency and renewable energy demonstration projects complemented with support to host communities in providing sustainable energy and solid waste solutions.

outputs.output_descr: Country energy efficiency and renewable energy demonstration project for the recovery of Lebanon - (CEDRO) Phase IV
Access to sustainable energy for host communities through the implementation of renewable energy systems; and provision of sustainable solid waste waste solutions.
Access to sustainable energy for host communities funded by the German through Lebanon Recovery Fund (LRF)
